subject: Q4 Planning Meeting - Need Your Input
body:

We need to schedule our Q4 planning meeting for next Tuesday at 2 PM. Please confirm your availability and come prepared with your department's goals and budget requirements.

Please respond by EOD Friday.

Best regards,
John

subject: Re: Proposal Review - Questions
body:
Hi there,

Thanks for the detailed proposal. Our team reviewed it and we have a few questions:

1. Can you clarify the timeline for Phase 2?
2. What's included in the premium support package?
3. Are there any volume discounts available?

Can we set up a call this week to discuss? I'm available Tuesday or Thursday afternoon.

Best,
Michael Chen
BigCorp Inc.

body:
Dear Team Members,

- All receipts attached
- Manager approval

subject: Security Alert: Password Reset Required
body:
SECURITY NOTICE

Due to a recent security audit, all employees must reset their passwords within 48 hours.

Password requirements:
- Minimum 12 characters
- Must include uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols
- Cannot reuse last 5 passwords

Reset your password: https://security.company.com/reset

Contact IT support if you need assistance.

IT Security Team

subject: Contract Review Required - Acme Corp Partnership
body:
Hi,

We've received the partnership agreement from Acme Corp and need your review from a technical perspective.

Key areas to review:
- SLA commitments (Section 4)
- Data processing terms (Section 7)
- Technical support obligations (Section 9)
- Integration timeline (Appendix B)

Contract value: $250,000 annually
Contract term: 3 years

Please provide your feedback by COB Wednesday, November 20th. This is time-sensitive as they want to finalize by month-end.

Document: https://company.sharepoint.com/contracts/acme-2025

Let me know if you need any clarification.

Best regards,
Jennifer Lee
Legal Department
